```{r }
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(cowplot)
library(tidyr)
library(stringr)
library(PairedData)
select = dplyr::select
```

```{r}
gtheme = theme_minimal() + theme_cowplot() + 
  theme(text = element_text(size=11, family = 'Arial'), axis.text = element_text(size=11)) 
data_dir = '~/Dropbox/phd/ymaze_chat_x_ai32/data/'
img_dir = '~/Dropbox/phd/ymaze_chat_x_ai32/img_gen/ymaze/'
```

```{r}
sem = function(x) sqrt( var(x, na.rm=TRUE) / length(x))
```

```{r}
df.raw = read_csv(paste0(data_dir, 'learning_perf.csv'))
df = gather(df.raw, 'mouse.id', 'correct', 2:ncol(df.raw)) %>%
  filter(!is.na(correct)) %>%
  filter(mouse.id != 0) %>%
  separate(mouse.id, c('cond', 'n', 'mouse.no'), sep='[_(]') %>%
  select(-n) %>%
  mutate(mouse.no=ifelse(is.na(mouse.no),0,mouse.no),
         cond=str_trim(cond))

df$day = as.factor(df$day)
df$cond = as.factor(df$cond)
df$correct = as.integer(df$correct)
df$mouse.no = as.integer(df$mouse.no)

```

```{r}
levels.prev = levels(df$cond)
df$cond = factor(df$cond, levels=levels.prev[c(2,1,4,3)])
```

```{r}
df %>%
  ggplot() +
  #geom_boxplot(aes(x=day, y=correct, colour=cond))
  geom_boxplot(aes(x=day, y=correct, colour=cond)) +
  gtheme +
  theme(legend.position='top') +
  labs(colour='', fill='') +
  xlab('Day') + ylab('Correct (%)')
```

```{r}
df %>%
  group_by(day,cond) %>%
  summarise(mcorrect=mean(correct), semcorrect=sem(correct)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=day, y=mcorrect, group=cond)) +
  geom_line(aes(colour=cond, group=cond)) +
  geom_point(aes(colour=cond, group=cond)) +
  #geom_errorbar(aes(ymin=mcorrect-semcorrect, ymax=mcorrect+semcorrect), width=0.2) +
  geom_ribbon(aes(ymin=mcorrect-semcorrect, ymax=mcorrect+semcorrect, fill=cond), alpha=0.1) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 50, linetype='dashed') +
  gtheme +
  theme(legend.position='none') +
  labs(colour='', fill='') +
  xlab('Day') + ylab('Correct (%)')
ggsave(paste0(img_dir, 'learning_curve.svg'), width=8, height=7.5, units='cm')
  
```



Reached learning criterion?
```{r}

which.day.learnt = function(correct_pct, learning.crit) {
  days=length(correct_pct):1
  for (day in days) {
    if (correct_pct[day] < learning.crit) {
      return(day+1)
    }
  }
  return(day)
}

df.learnt = df %>% 
  group_by(cond, mouse.no) %>%
  arrange(day) %>%
  summarise(learnt.90=which.day.learnt(correct, 90),
            learnt.80=which.day.learnt(correct, 80),
            learnt.70=which.day.learnt(correct, 70)) %>%
  gather(key='criterion', value='learnt.day', 3:5)

df.learnt.80 = filter(df.learnt, criterion == 'learnt.80')
df.learnt.90 = filter(df.learnt, criterion == 'learnt.90')
```


```{r}
library(ggpubr)
df.learnt %>%
  filter(criterion == 'learnt.80') %>%
  #ggplot(aes(x=cond, y=learnt.day)) +
  #geom_boxplot(aes(colour=cond), outlier.size=0) +
  ggpubr::ggboxplot(x='cond', y='learnt.day', color = 'cond' ) +
  geom_dotplot(aes(fill=cond), binaxis="y", stackdir="center", 
               binwidth=0.2, dotsize=1, stackratio=0.8, alpha=0.7) +
  stat_compare_means(aes(label = paste0('p=', ..p.format..)),
                     method='wilcox.test',
                     comparisons=list(c(1,3), c(1,4)),
                     label.y=c(6.5,7.4)) +
  gtheme +
  theme(axis.text.x=element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1)) +
  xlab('') + ylab('Days until learned (≥ 80 %)') +
  theme(legend.position = 'none') 

ggsave(paste0(img_dir, 'learnt_boxplot.svg'), width=7, height=10, units='cm')
```

```{r}
df.learnt.rew = filter(df.learnt, cond %in% c('No light', 'Reward'))
df.learnt.throughout = filter(df.learnt, cond %in% c('No light', 'Throughout maze'))
wilcox.test(learnt.day ~ cond, df.learnt.throughout, subset = criterion=='learnt.80')
wilcox.test(learnt.day ~ cond, df.learnt.rew, subset = criterion=='learnt.80')
```

```{r}
kruskal.test(learnt.day ~ cond, df.learnt, subset=criterion=='learnt.80')
library(FSA)
dunnTest(learnt.day ~ cond, df.learnt.80, method='none')
dunnTest(learnt.day ~ cond, df.learnt.90, method='none')

```

# Wild type test
```{r}
wtdf.raw = read_csv(paste0(data_dir, 'wt_learning_perf.csv'))
wtdf = gather(wtdf.raw, 'mouse.id', 'correct', 2:ncol(wtdf.raw)) %>%
  filter(!is.na(correct)) %>%
  filter(mouse.id != 0) %>%
  separate(mouse.id, c('cond', 'n', 'mouse.no'), sep='[_(]') %>%
  select(-n) %>%
  mutate(mouse.no=ifelse(is.na(mouse.no),0,mouse.no),
         cond=str_trim(cond))

wtdf$day = as.factor(wtdf$day)
wtdf$cond = as.factor(wtdf$cond)
wtdf$correct = as.integer(wtdf$correct)
wtdf$mouse.no = as.integer(wtdf$mouse.no)

```

```{r}

ggsave(paste0(img_dir, 'wt_learning_curve.svg'), width=8, height=7.5, units='cm')
  
```

```{r}
wtdf.learnt = wtdf %>%
```
